item.title: Moody and Circ
item.description: Although SpiceyPy is my largest public python package, this blog post will be about two smaller, but conceptually important projects that I have started that I think present some interesting concepts for the planetary science community. Both of these tools are Command Line Interfaces (CLIs) that are built upon the excellent python package “python-fire”. Fire is able to produce a rich command line utility from the existing functions in a python file or class, with essentially no additional code other than the import for fire and a single function call.

item.title: First
item.description: Welcome to my blog! I will be adding more content here about my studies and research over the next few weeks and months. thanks for reading. -A
